member.name: T:name_sorter.PrintNames
member.summary: Class performs printing functions for sorter, outputting SortedNames to console and writing its contents to a text file.

member.name: M:name_sorter.PrintNames.printSortedArray
member.summary: Main method for PrintArray. Writes sortedNames to text and console output

member.name: T:name_sorter.Program
member.summary: Program to take an unsorted list of names and return a sorted list from surname to given names and output the result to console and a .txt file in the working directory.

member.name: T:name_sorter.SortNames
member.summary: SortArray accepts an unsorted list and sorts, saving results to class variable

member.name: M:name_sorter.SortNames.performSort
member.summary: Takes namesForSorting, splits each line into seperate strings, performs sort by last name then by given names in reverse, adds sorted names to namesSorted
